Name: Biomass: Aboveground
Description: Carbon in all aboveground biomass pools

Name: Biomass: Belowground
Description: Carbon in all belowground biomnass pools (coarse plus fine roots)

Name: Biomass: Total
Description: Carbon in aboverground and belowground biomass pools

Name: DOM: Aboveground
Description: Carbon in DOM pools above the mineral soil

Name: DOM: Belowground
Description: Carbon in DOM pools in the mineral soil

Name: DOM: No Soil
Description: All DOM stocks except DOM: Soil stocks

Name: DOM: Soil
Description: Aboveground Slow, Belowground Slow, Belowground Very Fast, Deep Soil

Name: Total Ecosystem
Description: Carbon in Biomass and DOM pools
